title: Getting Started with Akira Docs
description: An introduction to Akira Docs, covering prerequisites, installation steps, and basic usage to help users get started.
author: Akira Docs Team

blocks.content: Welcome to the Akira Docs Getting Started guide! This document will walk you through the prerequisites, installation steps, basic usage, and next steps to help you quickly get up and running with Akira Docs.
Before you begin, ensure you have the following prerequisites:
Follow these steps to install Akira Docs:

Clone the Repository
Navigate to the Project Directory
Install Dependencies
Start the Development Server
Replace `yourusername` with the appropriate GitHub username.
To create your first documentation page using Akira Docs, follow these steps:

Create a New Document
Add Content
View Your Document

# My First Document

Welcome to Akira Docs! This is a simple document to get you started.
Save the file and navigate to `http://localhost:3000/my-first-doc` in your browser to see your newly created document.
Now that you have a basic setup, consider exploring the Akira Docs features to enhance your documentation.
